column4: FluttershyFan needs to install Ubuntu 11.04. All that FluttershyFan currently has at his disposal is an Ubuntu 9.04 (9.10?) liveCD (which is damaged and thus installation fails), a Windows XP LiveCD, and a flash drive.
Yes. Newer Ubuntu liveCDs (i.e. not 9.04) can do it via the "toram" kernel parameter.
i mean that he has at hand
